participant_1.background:
I love music and I like to keep my files organized.
i am a mother of 2 daughters.
my favorite place to spend time at is the beach.
I don't have time for Comic Con because I spend my weekends outdoors with my dog.
I like to try new restaurants and my favorite place to eat recently is this new sushi place that just opened up.

participant_2.background:
I like drinking hot chocolate while I read my mermaid books.
i have a collection of video games.
I spend most of my time working, but I make time for my friends and family when I can.
i try to do my job as best as i can.
i am an avid runner.

content.text: Hello! I am an avid runner and I love video games. What about you?
I love music, spending time at the beach and trying new restaurants. I also love keeping my files organized.
I wish I could spend more time at the beach. I work a lot and I also like to run so I don't have much time for anything else.
I can relate to that. I have two daughters and they keep me pretty busy.
I love kids! I don't have any of my own but I love spending time with my nieces and nephews.
We try to go to the beach as often as we can. My daughters love playing in the sand and swimming.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I wish I could join you.
Maybe we can get together sometime and go to the beach together.
That would be great! I would love to meet your daughters.
Sounds like a plan. We can exchange numbers and make plans.
Perfect! I look forward to it.
